bibl.title: Forgetting to Remember in the Dakhleh Oasis, Egypt.
bibl.note: Derives from a seminar on 'Cultural Memory' organized at the University of Birmingham, UK, in the academic year 2008-2009. - Introduction. - Harmonizing forgetting. - Migrating and forgetting in the Dakhleh Oasis. - Unseen palimpsests: forgetting for a collective identity. - Conclusions.

bibl.title: Cultural Memory and Identity in Ancient Societies

bibl.seg: Anna Lucille Boozer, Forgetting to Remember in the Dakhleh Oasis, Egypt.
Martin Bommas (ed.), Cultural Memory and Identity in Ancient Societies = Cultural Memory and History in Antiquity. 1 (London - New York, 2011) pp. 109-126, 3 figg.

Derives from a seminar on 'Cultural Memory' organized at the University of Birmingham, UK, in the academic year 2008-2009. - Introduction. - Harmonizing forgetting. - Migrating and forgetting in the Dakhleh Oasis. - Unseen palimpsests: forgetting for a collective identity. - Conclusions.
